compatibility.notes: The GPL-2.0-with-autoconf-exception allows linking with certain licenses, but care must be taken with proprietary licenses. The exception allows for the use of the library in a way that does not impose the GPL on the entire application.

key_requirements: Comply with the terms of the GPL v2 for all uses except for the configure scripts generated by Autoconf.
If modifying Autoconf, ensure that the special exception is not included if non-data portions are copied.
license.name: GPL-2.0-with-autoconf-exception
obligations: Must disclose source code when distributing modified versions.
Must include a copy of the GPL license when distributing the software.
Must include copyright notices from the original authors.
Must include notices of any changes made to the original software.
If distributing modified versions of Autoconf, must not include the Autoconf exception if the modifications could copy non-data portions.
